welcome.subject: Welcome to Business Unit 2
welcome.content:
Dear New Team Member,

Welcome to Business Unit 2! We're thrilled to have you join our dynamic team.

Business Unit 2 specializes in customer relations and market expansion. You'll be part of a team that directly impacts our company's growth and customer satisfaction.

What to expect:
- Customer-focused projects
- Market analysis and strategy development
- Cross-functional collaboration
- Continuous learning opportunities

Your onboarding buddy will contact you shortly to help you get settled.

Welcome aboard!

Best regards,
Business Unit 2 Management

announcement.subject: Business Unit 2 - Quarterly Update
announcement.content:
Dear Business Unit 2 Team,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to share some exciting updates about our unit's performance and upcoming changes.

Quarterly Highlights:
- 25% increase in customer satisfaction scores
- Successful launch of 3 new market initiatives
- Team expansion with 5 new hires
- Recognition for outstanding performance

Upcoming Changes:
- New CRM system implementation
- Revised customer service protocols
- Enhanced training programs
- Updated KPI metrics

Please join us for the quarterly review meeting next Tuesday at 3 PM.

Thank you for your continued dedication.

Best regards,
Business Unit 2 Director
